title: Hi, Night Sight on my Pixel 4 is not working properly, shot in dark room is also dark, any help?
content:
When I try use night mode to take a picture in dark or night environment, my pixel 4 is processing but after that final picture is also dark. I've restarted two times and updated software but the problem still appears.
In day time camera works normally but in evening or night everything is very dark. 
Any help?
